lore: Sat astride swift Steeds of Slaanesh, Seekers pursue their mortal prey with obsessive delight. Even the fastest of mortal vehicles cannot outpace these vicious entities, while those who stand and fight soon find their ranks smashed asunder by charging shock cavalry drawn from the darkest depths of nightmare.

otherAbilities.name: Unholy Speed:
otherAbilities.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

wargear.description: 1 Seeker that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
1 Seeker that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.
